headline: YouTube Creators in US Can Now Accept PayPal’s PYUSD Stablecoin
summary: PayPal’s PYUSD stablecoin is set to get a major boost as Alphabet Inc’s video streaming platform YouTube said that US-based creators can now accept payments in PYUSD. This development comes as the crypto regulatory landscape improves, showing greater acceptance for stablecoin, especially after the GENIUS Act approval in July 2025. ...
